title: Spider-Man 2: Coming to PC, Getting No DLC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.21.24
description:
New World: Aeternum is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Phasmophobia releases on PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Wishlist now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010

Download the Marvel Snap app now available on the App Store, Google Play and Steam, or visit http://www.marvelsnap.com to learn more.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades. 

Spider-Man 2 getting no DLC has been confirmed, Nintendo’s playtest is for some kind of MMO? AND Lego Horizons recasts Sylens.

- If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
   - You can get today’s Gregway and a Shout-Out to Parents (When All Hell Breaks Loose).
   - And you can get Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
- A new episode of Kinda Anime released this morning where Barrett & Mike talk about DanDaDan, Dragon Ball Z, & My Hero Season 7 Part 2. AND Barrett got the special opportunity to interview the English dub voice actors behind Endeavor, Dabi, and Shoto!
- It’s also a HUGE week of partnerships:
   - Tomorrow @ 9 am PT, we’re streaming two hours of Batman: Arkham Shadow with Ryan Payton!
Then, in the afternoon, we’re streaming Blumhouse’s new horror game Into the Spotlight and interviewing the devs!
